azurerm_iothub_dps.description: Manages an IoT Device Provisioning Service.

name.description: The name of the sku. Possible values are `B1`, `B2`, `B3`, `F1`, `S1`, `S2`, and `S3`.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group under which the Iot Device Provisioning Service resource has to be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The location of the IoT hub. Changing this forces a new resource.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

capacity.description: The number of provisioned IoT Device Provisioning Service units.

connection_string.description: The connection string to connect to the IoT Hub. Changing this forces a new resource.

apply_allocation_policy.description: Determines whether to apply allocation policies to the IoT Hub. Defaults to false.

allocation_weight.description: The weight applied to the IoT Hub. Defaults to 0.

id.description: The ID of the IoT Device Provisioning Service.

allocation_policy.description: The allocation policy of the IoT Device Provisioning Service.

device_provisioning_host_name.description: The device endpoint of the IoT Device Provisioning Service.

id_scope.description: The unique identifier of the IoT Device Provisioning Service.

service_operations_host_name.description: The service endpoint of the IoT Device Provisioning Service.

create.description: Used when creating the IotHub Device Provisioning Service.

update.description: Used when updating the IotHub Device Provisioning Service.

read.description: Used when retrieving the IotHub Device Provisioning Service.

delete.description: Used when deleting the IotHub Device Provisioning Service.
